topics.body:
I don't know if I sound like a total 90's kid when I say this but I miss the way movies looked in the 90's. With the superior sound and picture quality to the 80's but before the advent of digital color correction. 

I dunno. Digital color correction bugs me.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
